author: CMS-LUMI-POG
body:
Backport of  #40267

New pileup scenarios for Run3, corresponding to a maximum pileup of 60, 65, and 70 in the hybrid filling scheme. The methodology used for the creation of these scenarios is the same that was used for https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/34460, now with the available predictions for 2023 conditions (as provided by LHC experts over a year ago), a minimum bias cross section of 80mb, and with the instantaneous luminosity profile scaled to different leveling luminosities.
title: New Run3 pileup scenarios for max PU studies (12_4 backport)
